product_name: Union Micro Flite Snowboard Bindings - Kids'
long_description: The lightweight Union Micro Flite kids' bindings offer the comfort, support and forgiving flex needed for effortless stomping for all types of riding. Flite bases are super lightweight with a low-profile, freestyle-oriented design; they're made with high-quality Dupont(TM) Zytel(R) ST nylon. Injected EVA bushings damp vibrations underfoot, promoting a comfortable ride and smooth, even board flex with no dead spots. Baseplates are designed to be supremely strong with the smallest footprint possible; this promotes free, even board flex for sweeter response, board control and durability. Extruded aluminum heel cups undergo an anodizing process that further increases their strength by 30%; they'll maintain their shape no matter how much wear and tear they see. Flite highbacks offer flexibility and lightweight, easy mobility. Quickly adjust forward lean angle without tools. 3D-contoured, padded ankle straps and multi-position toe straps keep feet comfortably locked in; straps adjust without tools. Micro Flite bindings feature durable, lightweight aluminum buckles.
short_description: The lightweight Union Micro Flite kids' bindings offer the comfort, support and forgiving flex needed for effortless stomping for all types of riding.
